name: おとめ・ぱーてぃ
summary: There is a short story prepared for each game character, but story is chosen according to gender and one of the five age categories selected. The contents varies from a child story about the kitten if woman is chosen to the nursing story about the hospital if an old man is chosen.
info:
• 平台: PC98
  • 平台: PC88
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1989-12.15
  • ブランド: Game Technopolice
